test-case.description: test use-when="true()".

test-case.description: test use-when="false()".

test-case.description: test use-when= an expression that evaluates to true.

test-case.description: test use-when= an expression that evaluates to false.

test-case.description: test xsl:use-when on a literal result element

test-case.description: test xsl:use-when on a literal result element

test-case.description: test xsl:use-when on xsl:import-schema

test-case.name: use-when-0108
test-case.description: test xsl:use-when masking an extension element that doesn't exist

test-case.name: use-when-0109
test-case.description: test use-when with an expression containing a local variable.

test-case.name: use-when-0110
test-case.description: test use-when with an expression containing a local variable.

test-case.description: test use-when with an extension function.

test-case.name: use-when-0112
test-case.description: test use-when with an extension function.

test-case.description: test use-when on xsl:include

test-case.name: use-when-0114
test-case.description: test use-when on xsl:include

test-case.description: test use-when within an included stylesheet module

test-case.description: test use-when on (included) xsl:stylesheet element

test-case.name: use-when-0117
test-case.description: test use-when on (included) xsl:stylesheet element

test-case.name: use-when-0118
test-case.description: test use-when expression using the default namespace for elements and types.

test-case.name: use-when-0119
test-case.description: test use-when access to static base uri

test-case.name: use-when-0120
test-case.description: test use-when expression using the default namespace for elements and types.

test-case.name: use-when-0121
test-case.description: test use-when expression using the default namespace for elements and types.

test-case.name: use-when-0122
test-case.description: test that invalid XSL code is allowed in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0123
test-case.description: ERROR: test use-when attempting to access context node.

test-case.name: use-when-0124
test-case.description: ERROR: test use-when attempting to access global variable.

test-case.name: use-when-0125
test-case.description: test use-when expression with a non-applicable default namespace for elements and types.

test-case.name: use-when-0126
test-case.description: test use-when expression calling a stylesheet function (should fail).

test-case.name: use-when-0127a
test-case.description: test use-when expression calling generate-id() function (should fail in 2.0).

modified.change: Bug#28349 Should only fail with XSLT 2.0, not 3.0

test-case.name: use-when-0127b
test-case.description: test use-when expression calling generate-id() function (should work in 3.0).

test-case.name: use-when-0128
test-case.description: test use-when expression calling doc() function (should fail).

test-case.name: use-when-0129
test-case.description: test that the statically declared variable is allowed in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0130
test-case.description: test that the statically declared param is allowed in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0131
test-case.description: test that the declared variable, which is not static should fail in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0132
test-case.description: test that the declared param, which is not static should fail in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0133
test-case.description: Static variables are visible in a subsequently-included module

test-case.name: use-when-0134
test-case.description: Import precedence affecting static variables.

test-case.name: use-when-0135
test-case.description: Static base uri in static expressions is affected by xml:base

test-case.name: use-when-0136
test-case.description: Static base uri in static expressions is affected by use of external entities

test-case.name: use-when-0137
test-case.description: Precedence of static variables when the same module is imported more than once. (See bug 24478)

test-case.name: use-when-0138
test-case.description: Import precedence affecting static variables; error case

test-case.name: use-when-0139
test-case.description: test that the statically declared param and variable (with static="true") are allowed in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0140
test-case.description: test that the statically declared param and variable (with static="1") are allowed in an excluded section.

test-case.name: use-when-0201
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when attribute with a value of true on an xsl:template.

test-case.name: use-when-0202
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:element instruction in different levels (Parent-child, grandchild) (The EBV of the attribute results to true).

test-case.name: use-when-0203
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:element where the EBV of the attribute results to false.

test-case.name: use-when-0204
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:element instruction in different levels (Parent-child, grandchild) with the mixture of true and false values for the use-when attribute.

test-case.name: use-when-0205
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when attribute on an element that has a static error, the path expression of the attribute evaluates to false and therefore no error will be reported.

test-case.name: use-when-0206
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:attribute (The EBV of the attribute results to true).

test-case.name: use-when-0207
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:attribute where the EBV of the attribute results to false.

test-case.name: use-when-0208
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when attribute on both xsl:element and its attributes where the value use-when boolean value defined on the element is different from it attributes.

test-case.name: use-when-0209
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on an LRE in different levels (Parent-child, grandchild). (The EBV of the attribute results to true).

test-case.name: use-when-0210
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on an LRE in different levels (Parent-child, grandchild). (The EBV of the attribute results to false).

test-case.name: use-when-0211
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when attribute with a value of false on an xsl:template.

test-case.name: use-when-0212
test-case.description: Test case that uses system-property function as the expression used to evaluate the EBV of the use-when attribute.

test-case.name: use-when-0213
test-case.description: Test case in which use-when is used with element-available and function-available functions; Where the element and function exist.

test-case.name: use-when-0214
test-case.description: Test case in which use-when is used with element-available and function-available functions; Where the element and function do NOT exist.

test-case.name: use-when-0215
test-case.description: Test case in which use-when is used with an expression containing a local variable in a quantitative exp (using 'some').

test-case.name: use-when-0216
test-case.description: Test case in which use-when is used with an expression containing a local variable in a quantitative exp (using 'every').

test-case.name: use-when-0217
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of true on xsl:include instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0218
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of false on xsl:include instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0219
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when=true() on the on the xsl:include but the included stylesheet has a use-when=false().

test-case.name: use-when-0220
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when=false() on the on the xsl:include but the included stylesheet has a use-when=true().

test-case.name: use-when-0221
test-case.description: Test case to verify that no error is raised in respect of the element and its contents on which a use-when=false() attribute exist

test-case.name: use-when-0222
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:stylesheet to verify it has no effect on this element but it takes effect on all its children.

test-case.name: use-when-0223
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of true on xsl:import instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0224
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:import with an EBV of false.

test-case.name: use-when-0225
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on an element while the element has a static error and the EBV evaluates to true and therefore the elemnt should not be excluded from the module. This is to verify that the error is reported.

test-case.name: use-when-0226
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on an LRE while the element has a static error and the EBV evaluates to true and therefore the elemnt should not be excluded from the module. This is to verify that the error is reported

test-case.name: use-when-0227
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:stylesheet to verify that it has no effect on this element therefore if there is an error in the xsl:stylesheet instruction, it must be raised.

test-case.name: use-when-0301
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-attribute-set in an xsl:element instruction, and the attribute-set has a use-when attribute which evaluates to true.

source.content: <doc><data><elem1 name="e1" value="v1"> First element </elem1><elem2 name="e2" value="v2"> Last element </elem2></data></doc>

test-case.name: use-when-0401
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:call-template instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0402
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of false on an xsl:call-template instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0403
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:choose instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0404
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when with an EBV of false on an xsl:choose instruction. All of the xsl:when and xsl:otherwise instructions will be excluded as a result.

test-case.name: use-when-0405
test-case.description: Test case to confirm that whitespace stripping happens before element exclusion.

test-case.name: use-when-0406
test-case.description: Test case to verify that fn:doc-available always returns false within use-when, even when it would return true elsewhere in the stylesheet.

modified.change: Marked test as 2.0-only: in 3.0, use-when expressions can access documents

test-case.name: use-when-0407
test-case.description: XSLT20 only test Tests using function-available for generate-id, system-property, key, current, unparsed-entity-uri, and unparsed-entity-public-id in a use-when instruction.

modified.change: Fixed test-part on generate-id (which reported generate-id, but tested fn:current)
Only applies to XSLT 2.0, generate-id is allowed in 3.0, see use-when-0407a
The XSLT created output 'current:', but expected 'current', this lead to false positives

test-case.name: use-when-0407a
test-case.description: XSLT30+ version of previous test (generate-id is now available, it is part of FO30) Tests using function-available for generate-id, system-property, key, current, unparsed-entity-uri, and unparsed-entity-public-id in a use-when instruction.

modified.change: The XSLT created output 'current:', but expected 'current', this lead to false positives

test-case.name: use-when-0408
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="no" attribute, that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:choose instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0409
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="false" attribute, that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:choose instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0410
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="0" attribute, that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:choose instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0411
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="" attribute (not allowed), that uses use-when with an EBV of true on an xsl:choose instruction.

test-case.name: use-when-0412
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements.

modified.change: dependency on XSLT 3.0; with a 2.0 processor in forwards-compat mode the attribute is ignored

test-case.name: use-when-0413
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements Variant of previous, using alias namespace, should raise XTSE0090

modified.change: dependency on XSLT 3.0; with a 2.0 processor in forwards-compat mode the attribute is ignored

test-case.name: use-when-0414
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements Variant of previous, with an actual use-when=false, no error, no conflict, the correct use-when takes precedence

test-case.name: use-when-0415
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements Variant of previous, with an actual use-when=true, error, because of second xsl:use-when

modified.change: dependency on XSLT 3.0; with a 2.0 processor in forwards-compat mode the attribute is ignored

test-case.name: use-when-0416
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements Variant of previous, with second use-when and a different default namespace, has no effect on no-namespace of attribute

test-case.name: use-when-0417
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements Variant of previous, with xslt namespace set as the default namespace, has no effect on no-namespace of attribute

test-case.name: use-when-0418
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements xsl:fallback, normally ignored, but use-when errors should be triggered

test-case.name: use-when-0419
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements xsl:fallback, normally ignored, but use-when errors should be triggered

test-case.name: use-when-0420
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must not be in the xsl namespace on xsl elements xsl:fallback, normally ignored, with a positive use-when, has no effect

test-case.name: use-when-0421
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="true" variant of use-when-0411, with a valid static var and a body with use-when=false

test-case.name: use-when-0422
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs. In this case, must not throw XPST0003, but simply output the attribute

test-case.name: use-when-0423
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs Variant of previous, testing that the error is actually thrown: XPST0003

test-case.name: use-when-0424
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs. Variant of previous, with one in the xsl namespace and one not, EBV is false, no error.

test-case.name: use-when-0425
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs. Variant of previous, with one in the xsl namespace and one not, EBV is true, no error.

test-case.name: use-when-0426
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs. Variant of previous, with second use-when and a different default namespace, has no effect on no-namespace of attribute.

modified.change: Bug 28434, expected output was not well-formed

test-case.name: use-when-0427
test-case.description: Tests that use-when must be in the xsl namespace on LREs. Variant of previous, with xslt namespace set as the default namespace, has no effect on no-namespace of attribute, use-when has no effect

test-case.name: use-when-0428
test-case.description: Tests xsl:use-when inside xsl:fallback LRE with static error xsl:fallback, normally ignored, but use-when errors should be triggered

test-case.name: use-when-0429
test-case.description: Tests xsl:use-when inside xsl:fallback LRE with dynamic error xsl:fallback, normally ignored, but use-when errors should be triggered

test-case.name: use-when-0430
test-case.description: Tests xsl:use-when inside xsl:fallback LRE without error Variant of previous, without an error in the xsl:use-when expression inside xsl:fallback

test-case.name: use-when-0431
test-case.description: Test case using a variable with static="true" and error. Variant of use-when-0421, with use-when in no-namespace on an LRE, should raise error

test-case.name: use-when-0501
test-case.description: Test case that uses use-when on xsl:sort to avoid ascending sort.
